attributes.action: Bring England into line with the rest of the UK and give free prescriptions for ALL!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As England is now the only country in the UK to still have mandatory charges for prescriptions, it is now time to end this unfairness to English people and make prescriptions free to ALL, regardless of their conditions, at the point of need.  Those of us who still have to pay for them here are becoming increasingly more frustrated and anxious that we still have to pay for our own medicines, sometimes having to leave the prescription unfilled because we just cannot afford £7.10 per item! It is grossly unfair that the English people are, in effect, subsidising the rest of the UK so that people living in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland can have theirs free - it is NOT fair. 

If England remains the only country in the UK to keep charging it's people for their medicines then we can no longer be called UNITED Kingdom because we are not!  

Please sign the petition and end this postcode lottery prescription shame.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
